SEARCH
Package com.gcu.cst339_group5.game

Class GameService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.cst339_group5.game.GameService
@Service public class GameService extends Object
Service layer for handling business logic related to Game entities.

Provides methods for retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting games. Delegates persistence operations to the GameRepository.

    • updateGame

      public Game updateGame(Game game)
      Updates an existing game in the database.

      Since CrudRepository.save(Object) handles both create and update, this method delegates to save().

      Parameters:
      game - the Game containing updated values
      Returns:
      the updated Game
